update cst_linkman

update cst_linkman set cust_no = #{custNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lkm_cust_name = #{lkmCustName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lkm_name = #{lkmName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lkm_sex = #{lkmSex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, lkm_postion = #{lkmPostion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lkm_tel = #{lkmTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lkm_mobile = #{lkmMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lkm_memo = #{lkmMemo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where lkm_id = #{lkmId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
